def_cn: (西部电影中的)牛仔，骑马牧人
def_en: A cowboy is a male character in a western.

def_cn: (尤指旧时北美的)牧牛工，牛仔
def_en: A cowboy is a man employed to look after cattle in North America, especially in former times.

def_cn: 奸商;粗心大意的商人;无经验的商人
def_en: You can refer to someone who runs a business as a cowboy if they run it dishonestly or are not experienced, skilful, or careful in their work.
